snippet: After prompting by shareholders, 46 companies in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index have agreed to hold annual elections for all their directors, a corporate governance initiative run out of Harvard Law School said on Wednesday.
abstract: After prompting by shareholders, 46 companies in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index have agreed to hold annual elections for all their directors, a corporate governance initiative run out of Harvard Law School said on Wednesday.

headline.main: More Companies Holding Annual Board Elections, Group Reports
